snippet.title: KIBORG: Arena - PLAY NOW
snippet.description:
Wishlist 🦾
STEAM - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2405060?utm_source=youtube
PSN - https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008983
EGS - https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/kiborg-demo-3e5369

Pre order Kiborg in XBOX store! 
- https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9N6GLJSQBNZD


KIBORG is a relentless rogue-lite beat’em up where you enhance your body with new cybernetic implants each run. You’ve been sent to the worst prison in the galaxy for crimes you didn’t commit. Death won’t provide an escape, but a violent reality show may offer a way out. 

#Kiborg #indiegame #xbox 
Discord - https://discord.gg/mcFgpWUu3g
Twitter - https://twitter.com/SobakaStudio

Check out the brutal action of KIBORG: Arena -- the prologue to KIBORG, the fast-paced action rogue-lite. 
KIBORG: Arena available on Steam for PC, with Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5 coming soon. 


In KIBORG: Arena, perform brutal combos, assemble an arsenal of weapons, and unleash cybernetic-enhanced abilities as Morgan Lee, the leader of a ragtag group of resistance fighters on the prison planet Sigma. Slaughter an onslaught of increasingly tougher enemies in Arena’s Endless Mode. Earn money to upgrade weapons, unlock permanent upgrades, and start new runs to keep the resistance going.
